stageid.title: (Deprecated) Process Stage
stageid.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

name.title: Account Name
name.description: Type the company or business name.

accountnumber.title: Account Number
accountnumber.description: Type an ID number or code for the account to quickly search and identify the account in system views.

accountratingcode.title: Account Rating
accountratingcode.description: Select a rating to indicate the value of the customer account.

address1_city.title: Address 1: City
address1_city.description: Type the city for the primary address.

address1_country.title: Address 1: Country/Region
address1_country.description: Type the country or region for the primary address.

address1_county.title: Address 1: County
address1_county.description: Type the county for the primary address.

address1_fax.title: Address 1: Fax
address1_fax.description: Type the fax number associated with the primary address.

address1_freighttermscode.title: Address 1: Freight Terms
address1_freighttermscode.description: Select the freight terms for the primary address to make sure shipping orders are processed correctly.

address1_latitude.title: Address 1: Latitude
address1_latitude.description: Type the latitude value for the primary address for use in mapping and other applications.

address1_longitude.title: Address 1: Longitude
address1_longitude.description: Type the longitude value for the primary address for use in mapping and other applications.

address1_name.title: Address 1: Name
address1_name.description: Type a descriptive name for the primary address, such as Corporate Headquarters.

address1_postofficebox.title: Address 1: Post Office Box
address1_postofficebox.description: Type the post office box number of the primary address.

address1_primarycontactname.title: Address 1: Primary Contact Name
address1_primarycontactname.description: Type the name of the main contact at the account's primary address.

address1_shippingmethodcode.title: Address 1: Shipping Method
address1_shippingmethodcode.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

address1_stateorprovince.title: Address 1: State/Province
address1_stateorprovince.description: Type the state or province of the primary address.

address1_line1.title: Address 1: Street 1
address1_line1.description: Type the first line of the primary address.

address1_line2.title: Address 1: Street 2
address1_line2.description: Type the second line of the primary address.

address1_line3.title: Address 1: Street 3
address1_line3.description: Type the third line of the primary address.

address1_telephone2.title: Address 1: Telephone 2
address1_telephone2.description: Type a second phone number associated with the primary address.

address1_telephone3.title: Address 1: Telephone 3
address1_telephone3.description: Type a third phone number associated with the primary address.

address1_upszone.title: Address 1: UPS Zone
address1_upszone.description: Type the UPS zone of the primary address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by UPS.

address1_utcoffset.title: Address 1: UTC Offset
address1_utcoffset.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

address1_postalcode.title: Address 1: ZIP/Postal Code
address1_postalcode.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the primary address.

address2_city.title: Address 2: City
address2_city.description: Type the city for the secondary address.

address2_country.title: Address 2: Country/Region
address2_country.description: Type the country or region for the secondary address.

address2_county.title: Address 2: County
address2_county.description: Type the county for the secondary address.

address2_fax.title: Address 2: Fax
address2_fax.description: Type the fax number associated with the secondary address.

address2_freighttermscode.title: Address 2: Freight Terms
address2_freighttermscode.description: Select the freight terms for the secondary address to make sure shipping orders are processed correctly.

address2_latitude.title: Address 2: Latitude
address2_latitude.description: Type the latitude value for the secondary address for use in mapping and other applications.

address2_longitude.title: Address 2: Longitude
address2_longitude.description: Type the longitude value for the secondary address for use in mapping and other applications.

address2_name.title: Address 2: Name
address2_name.description: Type a descriptive name for the secondary address, such as Corporate Headquarters.

address2_postofficebox.title: Address 2: Post Office Box
address2_postofficebox.description: Type the post office box number of the secondary address.

address2_primarycontactname.title: Address 2: Primary Contact Name
address2_primarycontactname.description: Type the name of the main contact at the account's secondary address.

address2_shippingmethodcode.title: Address 2: Shipping Method
address2_shippingmethodcode.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

address2_stateorprovince.title: Address 2: State/Province
address2_stateorprovince.description: Type the state or province of the secondary address.

address2_line1.title: Address 2: Street 1
address2_line1.description: Type the first line of the secondary address.

address2_line2.title: Address 2: Street 2
address2_line2.description: Type the second line of the secondary address.

address2_line3.title: Address 2: Street 3
address2_line3.description: Type the third line of the secondary address.

address2_telephone1.title: Address 2: Telephone 1
address2_telephone1.description: Type the main phone number associated with the secondary address.

address2_telephone2.title: Address 2: Telephone 2
address2_telephone2.description: Type a second phone number associated with the secondary address.

address2_telephone3.title: Address 2: Telephone 3
address2_telephone3.description: Type a third phone number associated with the secondary address.

address2_upszone.title: Address 2: UPS Zone
address2_upszone.description: Type the UPS zone of the secondary address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by UPS.

address2_utcoffset.title: Address 2: UTC Offset
address2_utcoffset.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

address2_postalcode.title: Address 2: ZIP/Postal Code
address2_postalcode.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the secondary address.

address1_telephone1.title: Address Phone
address1_telephone1.description: Type the main phone number associated with the primary address.

revenue.title: Annual Revenue
revenue.description: Type the annual revenue for the account, used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

businesstypecode.title: Business Type
businesstypecode.description: Select the legal designation or other business type of the account for contracts or reporting purposes.

accountcategorycode.title: Category
accountcategorycode.description: Select a category to indicate whether the customer account is standard or preferred.

accountclassificationcode.title: Classification
accountclassificationcode.description: Select a classification code to indicate the potential value of the customer account based on the projected return on investment, cooperation level, sales cycle length or other criteria.

creditonhold.title: Credit Hold
creditonhold.description: Select whether the credit for the account is on hold. This is a useful reference while addressing the invoice and accounting issues with the customer.

creditlimit.title: Credit Limit
creditlimit.description: Type the credit limit of the account. This is a useful reference when you address invoice and accounting issues with the customer.

transactioncurrencyid@odata.bind.title: Currency (Currencies)
transactioncurrencyid@odata.bind.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

customersizecode.title: Customer Size
customersizecode.description: Select the size category or range of the account for segmentation and reporting purposes.

entityimage.title: Default Image
entityimage.description: Shows the default image for the record.

description.title: Description
description.description: Type additional information to describe the account, such as an excerpt from the company's website.

donotbulkemail.title: Do not allow Bulk Emails
donotbulkemail.description: Select whether the account allows bulk email sent through campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account can be added to marketing lists, but is excluded from email.

donotbulkpostalmail.title: Do not allow Bulk Mails
donotbulkpostalmail.description: Select whether the account allows bulk postal mail sent through marketing campaigns or quick campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account can be added to marketing lists, but will be excluded from the postal mail.

donotemail.title: Do not allow Emails
donotemail.description: Select whether the account allows direct email sent from Microsoft Dynamics 365.

donotfax.title: Do not allow Faxes
donotfax.description: Select whether the account allows faxes. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from fax activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

donotpostalmail.title: Do not allow Mails
donotpostalmail.description: Select whether the account allows direct mail. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from letter activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

donotphone.title: Do not allow Phone Calls
donotphone.description: Select whether the account allows phone calls. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from phone call activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

emailaddress1.title: Email
emailaddress1.description: Type the primary email address for the account.

emailaddress2.title: Email Address 2
emailaddress2.description: Type the secondary email address for the account.

emailaddress3.title: Email Address 3
emailaddress3.description: Type an alternate email address for the account.

fax.title: Fax
fax.description: Type the fax number for the account.

followemail.title: Follow Email Activity
followemail.description: Information about whether to allow following email activity like opens, attachment views and link clicks for emails sent to the account.

ftpsiteurl.title: FTP Site
ftpsiteurl.description: Type the URL for the account's FTP site to enable users to access data and share documents.

importsequencenumber.title: Import Sequence Number
importsequencenumber.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

industrycode.title: Industry
industrycode.description: Select the account's primary industry for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis.

lastonholdtime.title: Last On Hold Time
lastonholdtime.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

telephone1.title: Main Phone
telephone1.description: Type the main phone number for this account.

msa_managingpartnerid@odata.bind.title: Managing Partner (Accounts)
msa_managingpartnerid@odata.bind.description: Unique identifier for Account associated with Account.

marketcap.title: Market Capitalization
marketcap.description: Type the market capitalization of the account to identify the company's equity, used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

numberofemployees.title: Number of Employees
numberofemployees.description: Type the number of employees that work at the account for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis.

telephone2.title: Other Phone
telephone2.description: Type a second phone number for this account.

ownerid@odata.bind.title: Owner (Owners)
ownerid@odata.bind.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

ownershipcode.title: Ownership
ownershipcode.description: Select the account's ownership structure, such as public or private.

parentaccountid@odata.bind.title: Parent Account (Accounts)
parentaccountid@odata.bind.description: Choose the parent account associated with this account to show parent and child businesses in reporting and analytics.

participatesinworkflow.title: Participates in Workflow
participatesinworkflow.description: For system use only. Legacy Microsoft Dynamics CRM 3.0 workflow data.

paymenttermscode.title: Payment Terms
paymenttermscode.description: Select the payment terms to indicate when the customer needs to pay the total amount.

preferredappointmentdaycode.title: Preferred Day
preferredappointmentdaycode.description: Select the preferred day of the week for service appointments.

preferredcontactmethodcode.title: Preferred Method of Contact
preferredcontactmethodcode.description: Select the preferred method of contact.

preferredappointmenttimecode.title: Preferred Time
preferredappointmenttimecode.description: Select the preferred time of day for service appointments.

preferredsystemuserid@odata.bind.title: Preferred User (Users)
preferredsystemuserid@odata.bind.description: Choose the preferred service representative for reference when you schedule service activities for the account.

primarycontactid@odata.bind.title: Primary Contact (Contacts)
primarycontactid@odata.bind.description: Choose the primary contact for the account to provide quick access to contact details.

processid.title: Process
processid.description: Shows the ID of the process.

overriddencreatedon.title: Record Created On
overriddencreatedon.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

customertypecode.title: Relationship Type
customertypecode.description: Select the category that best describes the relationship between the account and your organization.

donotsendmm.title: Send Marketing Materials
donotsendmm.description: Select whether the account accepts marketing materials, such as brochures or catalogs.

sharesoutstanding.title: Shares Outstanding
sharesoutstanding.description: Type the number of shares available to the public for the account. This number is used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

shippingmethodcode.title: Shipping Method
shippingmethodcode.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to the account's address to designate the preferred carrier or other delivery option.

sic.title: SIC Code
sic.description: Type the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code that indicates the account's primary industry of business, for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis.

sla_account_sla@odata.bind.title: SLA (SLAs)
sla_account_sla@odata.bind.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the Account record.

stockexchange.title: Stock Exchange
stockexchange.description: Type the stock exchange at which the account is listed to track their stock and financial performance of the company.

telephone3.title: Telephone 3
telephone3.description: Type a third phone number for this account.

territorycode.title: Territory Code
territorycode.description: Select a region or territory for the account for use in segmentation and analysis.

tickersymbol.title: Ticker Symbol
tickersymbol.description: Type the stock exchange symbol for the account to track financial performance of the company. You can click the code entered in this field to access the latest trading information from MSN Money.

utcconversiontimezonecode.title: UTC Conversion Time Zone Code
utcconversiontimezonecode.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

websiteurl.title: Website
websiteurl.description: Type the account's website URL to get quick details about the company profile.

yominame.title: Yomi Account Name
yominame.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the company name, if specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls and other communications.
